name: Casco
long_description:
Casco performs autonomous security testing for your web apps, APIs, infrastructure, and AI systems. Human supervision optionally available. Use Casco for year-round security and get a penetration test report for your SOC2 and ISO27001 compliance certifications. 

Trusted by 100+ companies from enterprises to fast-moving startups, such as Gusto, CrewAI, Novig, and Delve.

Hack yourself at: https://casco.com

---

We already secure software deployed in 60% of Fortune 500 companies and are default alive. [1]

[1] http://www.paulgraham.com/aord.html
one_liner: Autonomous security testing for web apps, APIs, cloud, and AI systems
